description:
The MOD11C2.005 dataset was decommissioned as of April 9, 2018. 

The MODIS/Terra V5 LST/E 8-Day L3 Global CMG product (Short name: MOD11C2) is an 8-day composited average, derived from the MOD11C1 daily global product, and stored as clear-sky LST values during an 8-day period in a 0.05º (5600 meters) geographic CMG. MOD11C2, therefore, inherits all the structural features of its MOD11C1 parent except for the temporal configuration. Please refer to the MOD11C1 product documentation for all algorithm-related details.

The V5 MOD11C2 product comprises the following Science Data Set (SDS) layers for daytime and nighttime observations: LSTs, quality control assessments, observation times, view zenith angles, clear sky coverages, and emissivities for bands 20, 22, 23, 29, 31, and 32.

The V5 Terra/MODIS LST/E products, including MOD11C2, are validated to Stage-2 through field campaigns and radiance-based validation studies. Further details regarding MODIS land product validation for the LST/E products are available from the following URL: http://landval.gsfc.nasa.gov/ProductStatus.php?ProductID=MOD11

This product is ready for use in science applications/publications.

The V5 MOD11C2 products have a temporal acquisition range, which starts March 5, 2000 (2000-065), and continued through March 29, 2017. The V5 collection is not consistent with V4 and V41, and users should exercise caution as they plan to use the different collections.

V005 Data Set Characteristics:
Temporal Coverage: V005 March 5, 2000 – March 29, 2017
Area: Global 
Dimensions: 3600 x 7200 rows/columns 
Resolution: 0.05-degrees (5600-meters at the equator) 
File Size: ~70 MB 
Projection: Geographic (Lat/Lon grid)
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 17
title: MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity 8-Day L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V005
